name: Stats Roll
description:
Made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam, the theme of which was "Roll of the Dice".

How to play:

On the roll swapping screen, click on the dice and on continue interact with them.

On the battle screen, use WASD or the arrow keys to move and, "," or "z" to attack.

Possible future additions:

  • Different buffs in addition to the "swap two dice" buff that can be chosen at the start of a run (I want to add more stuff that synergizes with the dice)
  • Upgrades in between rooms, big upgrades in between bosses
  • Bosses
  • More weapons
  • More enemies
  • More battle room types
  • General improvements (cleanliness of code, better art, music, etc.)
